blocks.name: csiga
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the function giving the sigma-algebras on a given base set.
blocks.origin: const class csiga { sigAlgebra }

blocks.name: diff.csiga.s
diff.csiga.c
diff.csiga.w
df-siga
blocks.content: Define a sigma-algebra, i.e. a set closed under complement and countable union. Literature usually uses capital greek sigma and omega letters for the algebra set, and the base set respectively. We are using ` S ` and ` O ` as a parallel. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Sep-2016.)

blocks.name: sigaex
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ issiga and ~ isrnsiga . The class of sigma-algebras with base set ` o ` is a set. Note: a more generic version with ` ( O e. _V -> ... ) ` could be useful for ~ sigaval . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm sigaex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  |- wcel(cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cpw(cv(s1))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))), universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqeltrri(cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cpw(cv(s1))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))), universe, crab(s0, cpw(cpw(cv(s1))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))))
  eqtri(crab(s0, cpw(cpw(cv(s1))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))), cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cpw(cv(s1))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cpw(cv(s1)))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))))
  df-rab(s0, cpw(cpw(cv(s1))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))
  abbii(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cpw(cv(s1)))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))), wa(wss(cv(s0), cpw(cv(s1))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cpw(cv(s1)))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s2)), cv(s0))))), wss(cv(s0), cpw(cv(s1))))
  selpw(s0, cpw(cv(s1)))
  rabex(s0, cpw(cpw(cv(s1))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))
  mp2b(wcel(cpw(cpw(cv(s1))), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe), wcel(cpw(cv(s1)), universe))
  vex(s1)
  pwexg(cv(s1), universe)
  pwexg(cpw(cv(s1)), universe)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cpw(cv(s1)))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

  selpw(s0, P(s1))
  rabex(s0, P(P(s1)), (s1 âˆˆ s0 âˆ§ âˆ€(s2 âˆˆ s0,(s1 \ s2)âˆˆ s0)âˆ§ âˆ€(s2 âˆˆ P(s0),(s2[â‰¼]_om â†’ â‹ƒ s2 âˆˆ s0))))
  mp2b(P(P(s1))âˆˆ ğ•Œ, s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, P(s1)âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  vex(s1)
  pwexg(s1, universe)
  pwexg(P(s1), universe)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, P(s1))

blocks.name: sigaval
blocks.content: The set of sigma-algebra with a given base set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Sep-2016.)

  df-rab(s0, cpw(cpw(c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(s0), cpw(cv(hs0))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s1)), cv(s0))))), wss(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))
  sseq2d(cv(s0), cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c0)

  eleq1d(cdif(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s0), cdif(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  difeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))
  df-siga(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cpw(c0))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))))

blocks.name: issiga
blocks.content: An alternative definition of the sigma-algebra, for a given base set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm issiga(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csiga, c1)), wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm5.21ndd(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cfv(csiga, c1)), wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, universe), wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csiga, c1)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe))))
  jca(wcel(c0, cfv(csiga, c1)), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  elfvex(c0, csiga, c1)
  elex(c0, cfv(csiga, c1))
  anc2ri(wcel(c0, universe), wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, universe), wi(wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))), wcel(c1, universe)))
  syl(wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c1, c0))
  simpr1(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))
  elex(c1, c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, universe), wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csiga, c1)), wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))))))
  abfmpel(hs1, hs0, c1, universe, c0, universe, csiga, wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(hs1))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wcel(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))))
  df-siga(hs1, hs0, s0)
  sigaex(hs0, hs1, s0)
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wss(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(hs1))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wcel(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))), wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)))))
  sylan9bb(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(hs1))), wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)))
  sseq2d(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  pweq(cv(hs1), c1)
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c0, cpw(c1))
  3anbi123d(wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wcel(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))
  eleq12(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0), c0)
  raleqbidv(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  bitrd(wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))
  eleq1d(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0), cdif(c1, cv(s0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cdif(c1, cv(s0))))
  difeq1(cv(hs1), c1, cv(s0))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cdif(c1, cv(s0)))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cuni(cv(s0)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(csiga)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csiga)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: 0elsiga

blocks.name: baselsiga
blocks.content: A sigma-algebra contains its base universe set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Oct-2016.)

blocks.name: sigasspw
blocks.content: A sigma-algebra is a set of subset of the base set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: sigaclcu
blocks.content: A sigma-algebra is closed under countable union. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: issgon

blocks.name: sgon
blocks.content: A sigma-algebra is a sigma on its union set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: elsigass
blocks.content: An element of a sigma-algebra is a subset of the base set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: elrnsiga
blocks.content: Dropping the base information off a sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Feb-2017.)

blocks.name: isrnsigau
blocks.content: The property of being a sigma-algebra, universe is the union set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Nov-2016.)

blocks.name: unielsiga
blocks.content: A sigma-algebra contains its universe set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Feb-2017.) (Shortened by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: dmvlsiga
blocks.content: Lebesgue-measurable subsets of ` RR ` form a sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Sep-2016.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Oct-2016.)

blocks.name: sigaclci
blocks.content: A sigma-algebra is closed under countable intersections. Deduction version. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Sep-2016.)

blocks.name: difelsiga
blocks.content: A sigma-algebra is closed under class differences. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Sep-2016.)

thm difelsiga(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0))

  syl22anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cint(cpr(cdif(cuni(c0), c2), c1)), c0), wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cpr(cdif(cuni(c0), c2), c1), cpw(c0)), wbr(cpr(cdif(cuni(c0), c2), c1), cdom, com), wne(cpr(cdif(cuni(c0), c2), c1), emptycls))

  prssi(cdif(cuni(c0), c2), c0, c1)

  simp2d(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))))

blocks.name: unelsiga
blocks.content: A sigma-algebra is closed under pairwise unions. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Dec-2016.)

thm unelsiga(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cun(c1, c2), c0))

  simp3d(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))), wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0)))
  simprd(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), w3a(wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)))), wss(c0, cpw(cuni(c0))))
  isrnsigau(hs0, c0)

  prelpwi(c1, c0, c2)
  rspcv(hs0, cpr(c1, c2), cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wi(wbr(cpr(c1, c2), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cpr(c1, c2)), c0)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wbr(cpr(c1, c2), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cpr(c1, c2)), c0))

blocks.name: inelsiga
blocks.content: A sigma-algebra is closed under pairwise intersections. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: sigainb

blocks.name: insiga
blocks.content: The intersection of a collection of sigma-algebras of same base is a sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Dec-2016.)
